Parameters: Donor anatomical region (bronchial, nasal); cell model type (MucilAir™, primary HAEC, mouse tracheal epithelial cells); days at ALI; donor characteristics and passage number; tissue type (cultured vs ex vivo); p73 genotype; subject characteristics (age, disease state - CF vs healthy); culture conditions; differentiation medium; substrate type; environmental conditions (temperature 37°C, humidity); probe positioning protocol; imaging duration; frame rate

Heated tobacco aerosol (16, 32, or 48 puffs per exposure over 28 days); cigarette smoke; electronic vapor product aerosol; p73 knockout or siRNA manipulation; acetylated α-tubulin staining for cilia; FoxJ1 staining; temperature control at 37°C; imaging intervals; SAVA software analysis; µOCT system (~1-2 µm axial resolution)

Cilia beat frequency (Hz) over time; Cilia active area (%) or percentage of ciliated area exhibiting motility; Mucociliary transport rate (mm/min); Number of cilia per cell; Cilia length (µm); Percentage of ciliated cells; FoxJ1 expression levels; ASL depth (µm); Periciliary layer depth (µm); Ciliary motion patterns; Cell type ratios (ciliated vs goblet); Tissue microstructure
